fi.tamk.mindpuzzle

Class MindPuzzle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • fi.tamk.mindpuzzle.MindPuzzle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class MindPuzzle
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    MindPuzzle is the main class of the application that contains metadata of the game and methods the game is operated with. MindPuzzle includes information on what was the last visible screen and character, how many questions in the rooms have been answered and amount of the points. It also handles the text files, screen switching, the reset of the game and the saving of language settings and character status to the Preferences file.
    Since:
    15.0.1

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create()
        Initializes objects, font and language. Handles the text files and sends them to MainMenuScreen. And finally sets the screen to loading screen.

      • saveCharacter

        public void saveCharacter(java.lang.String character,
                          java.lang.Boolean roomCharacter)
        Saves character's status into the Preferences file.
        Parameters:
        character - character that has been clicked
        roomCharacter - room where the character is

      • openCharacters

        public boolean openCharacters(java.lang.String character,
                              java.lang.Boolean roomCharacter)
        Gets and returns the saved boolean value for the characters visibility.
        Parameters:
        character - the character whose status is being asked
        roomCharacter - default value if there is no data stored in Preferences file yet
        Returns:
        boolean if the character should be visible in the rooms or not

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame()
        Reset the game. However, retains the language and audio settings made during the first round of play.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes SpriteBatch, BitmapFonts, AssetManager and classes' objects.
